original_title: Police arrest suspect with 30 kgs of Ice, hash
original_body_lines: Kaduwela, April 27 (Daily Mirror) - A 30-year-old man was arrested by the Biyagama Police in Kaduwela for possession of a substantial haul of narcotics.
Police said the suspect was carrying 15 kilograms of ICE, 14 kilograms of hash and 941 grams of heroin at the time of the arrest.
